pinyin: zhu4 ren2 wei2 kuai4 le4 zhi1 ben3

definition: The Sound of Music, Broadway musical (1959) and Academy Award-winning movie (1965)
that being the case/then/in that case
(Confucianism) rites and music (the means of regulating society)
to lose sth abstract but important (courage, authority, one's life etc)/to be bereaved of (one's spouse etc)/to die/disappointed/discouraged
very close/no gap between them/continuously/unbroken/hard to separate/indistinguishable
abbr. for Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]/abbr. for Nanjing 南京[Nan2 jing1]/surname Ning
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook

the Confucian Six Arts, namely: rites or etiquette 禮|礼[li3] (禮儀|礼仪[li3 yi2]), music 樂|乐[yue3] (音樂|音乐[yin1 yue4]), archery 射[she4] (射箭[she4 jian4]), charioteering 御[yu4] (駕車|驾车[jia4 che1]), calligraphy or literacy 書|书[shu1] (識字|识字[shi2 zi4]), mathematics or reckoning 數|数[shu4] (計算|计算[ji4 suan4])/another name for the Six Classics 六經|六经[Liu4 jing1]
ode/eulogy/to praise in writing/to wish (in letters)
(literary) what is?/what is the meaning of?
